description: This file defines a PHP class 'csrfprotector_rdkb' that extends another class 'csrfprotector' and adds a static method 'logCSRFattack'. It includes licensing information and an external include file.

classes.name: csrfprotector_rdkb
classes.description: A class extending 'csrfprotector' with a static method for logging CSRF attacks

methods.name: logCSRFattack
